main event: A civilian reported seeing one unidentified aerial object over Belmont, Ohio on May 3, 1965 at around 2:00 AM.
interesting points: The object was reported to be stationary.
The witness was determined to be playing a prank and the report was deemed unreliable.
The report mentions a military station and 164 rounds being fired at the object, but it did not register any impact.
There are mentions of the object being bright, resembling an egg, and making a sound.
The report mentions a deputy sheriff being contacted and interviewed about a high speed sighting.
